name: DeadBase 50
tagline: Celebrating 50 Years of the Grateful Dead
body:
# _Introducing DeadBase 50_

_**Available July 2015, a complete reprint of DeadBase XI (the last complete edition), plus â€”**_
- Brand new Discography
- New Photos, Essays and Analysis

**With updates to:**
- DeadBase
- GarciaBase
- WeirBase
- PhilBase

**And new features:**
- NedBase
- The Other Ones
- The Dead
- Furthur
